languages.text: "Ты пробудил{mf|ся|ась}, мон-кай". {n}Голос Маражая тошнотворно ласков. Друкари с ленивым интересом разглядывает вас, при этом перекатывая на ладони какой-то мягкий и белесый предмет.{/n} "Мастерам ядов потребовалось немало усилий, чтобы вытащить тебя из наведенного сна. Надо отдать должное нашим творцам кошмаров — эманации страхов, что ты источал{mf||а} в своем бреду, достойны величайших похвал. Впрочем, пришло время закончить то, ради чего ты оказал{mf|ся|ась} здесь. Время потрудиться во благо кабала, Вольный Торговец".

"You are awake, mon-keigh." {n}Marazhai's voice is sickeningly sweet. He is looking at you with idle interest, rolling a soft and milky-coloured object from one hand to the other.{/n} "Our toxin masters spared no efforts to drag you out of the induced dream. I must commend the nightmare weavers. The emanations of fear you exuded in your delirium are worthy of the highest praise. However, it is time to finish what you were brought here for. It is time to work for the good of the Kabal, Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Ты пробудил{mf|ся|ась}, мон-кай". {n}Голос Маражая тошнотворно ласков. languages.text: « Vous êtes {mf|réveillé|réveillée}, mon-keigh. » {n}La voix de Marazhai est d'une douceur écœurante. Il vous observe d'un air détaché en faisant rouler un objet nacré entre ses mains.{/n} « Nos maîtres des toxines n'ont pas ménagé leur peine pour vous arracher au rêve artificiel. Je me dois de féliciter les tisseurs de cauchemars. Les émanations de peur que vous avez dégagées dans votre délire sont dignes des plus grands éloges. Cependant, il est temps de terminer ce pour quoi vous avez été {mf|amené|amenée} ici. Il est temps pour vous d'œuvrer pour le bien de la Kabale, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "You are awake, mon-keigh." {n}Marazhai's voice is sickeningly sweet. He is looking at you with idle interest, rolling a soft and milky-coloured object from one hand to the other.{/n} "Our toxin masters spared no efforts to drag you out of the induced dream. I must commend the nightmare weavers. The emanations of fear you exuded in your delirium are worthy of the highest praise. However, it is time to finish what you were brought here for. It is time to work for the good of the Kabal, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes {mf|réveillé|réveillée}, mon-keigh. » {n}La voix de Marazhai est d'une douceur écœurante. Il vous observe d'un air détaché en faisant rouler un objet nacré entre ses mains.{/n} « Nos maîtres des toxines n'ont pas ménagé leur peine pour vous arracher au rêve artificiel. Je me dois de féliciter les tisseurs de cauchemars. Les émanations de peur que vous avez dégagées dans votre délire sont dignes des plus grands éloges. Cependant, il est grand temps que vous terminiez ce pour quoi vous avez été {mf|amené|amenée} ici. Il est grand temps que vous travailliez pour le bien de la Kabale, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: “你醒了，猴子。”{n}玛拉斋的声音甜蜜得令人作呕。他漫不经心地看着你，将一只软软的、乳白色的东西从一只手揉到了另一只手里。{/n}“我们的毒素之主不遗余力，将你从幻觉与梦境中拖了出来。你在谵妄之中散发出的恐惧，实在是再美味不过，我真该好好赞扬一下那些噩梦编织者才行。不过，是时候做你来这里该做的事情了。你该为阴谋团的利益做出贡献了，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: "You are awake, mon-keigh." {n}Marazhai's voice is sickeningly sweet. He is looking at you with idle interest, rolling a soft and milky-coloured object from one hand to the other.{/n} "Our toxin masters spared no efforts to drag you out of the induced dream. I must commend the nightmare weavers. The emanations of fear you exuded in your delirium are worthy of the highest praise. However, it is time to finish what you were brought here for. It is time to work for the good of the Kabal, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “你醒了，猴子。”{n}玛拉斋的声音甜蜜得令人作呕。他漫不经心地看着你，将一只软软的、乳白色的东西从一只手揉到了另一只手里。{/n}“我们的毒素之主不遗余力，将你从幻觉与梦境中拖了出来。你在谵妄之中散发出的恐惧，实在是再美味不过，我真该好好赞扬一下那些噩梦编织者才行。不过，是时候做你来这里该做的事情了。你该为阴谋团的利益做出贡献了，行商浪人。”

languages.text: 「目が覚めたか、モン＝ケイ」{n}マラズハイの声は不気味なほど甘ったるかった。彼は両手で柔らかい乳白色の物体を転がしながら、気だるげな興味であなたを見ている。{/n}「毒使いたちが、夢からお前を引きずり出すためにあらゆる努力をしたのだ。この悪夢を作り出した連中を褒めてやらなければな。お前が錯乱状態の中で発散させた恐怖は、まさに絶賛すべきものだった。しかし、お前にはそろそろここに連れて来られた目的を果たしてもらおう。自由開拓者よ、陰謀団のために働く時が来たのだ」
languages.original_text: "You are awake, mon-keigh." {n}Marazhai's voice is sickeningly sweet. He is looking at you with idle interest, rolling a soft and milky-coloured object from one hand to the other.{/n} "Our toxin masters spared no efforts to drag you out of the induced dream. I must commend the nightmare weavers. The emanations of fear you exuded in your delirium are worthy of the highest praise. However, it is time to finish what you were brought here for. It is time to work for the good of the Kabal, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「目が覚めたか、モン＝ケイ」{n}マラズハイの声は不気味なほど甘ったるかった。彼は両手で柔らかい乳白色の物体を転がしながら、気だるげな興味であなたを見ている。{/n}「毒使いたちが、夢からお前を引きずり出すためにあらゆる努力をしたのだ。この悪夢を作り出した連中を褒めてやらなければな。お前が錯乱状態の中で発散させた恐怖は、まさに絶賛すべきものだった。しかし、お前にはそろそろここに連れて来られた目的を果たしてもらおう。自由開拓者よ、陰謀団のために働く時が来たのだ」

languages.text: "Ihr seid wach, Chem-Pan-Sey." {n}Marazhais Stimme klingt widerwärtig süß. Er schaut dich wenig interessiert an und rollt einen weichen, milchigen Gegenstand zwischen seinen Handflächen hin und her.{/n} "Unsere Toxinmeister haben keine Mühen gescheut, Euch aus dem herbeigeführten Traum zu holen. Ich muss den Albtraumwebern ein Lob aussprechen. Die Emanationen der Angst, die Ihr im Delirium ausgestrahlt habt, verdienen wirklich höchste Anerkennung. Doch nun wird es Zeit, zu Ende zu bringen, wofür Ihr hergebracht wurdet. Es wird Zeit, dass Ihr dem Wohle der Kabale dient, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "You are awake, mon-keigh." {n}Marazhai's voice is sickeningly sweet. He is looking at you with idle interest, rolling a soft and milky-coloured object from one hand to the other.{/n} "Our toxin masters spared no efforts to drag you out of the induced dream. I must commend the nightmare weavers. The emanations of fear you exuded in your delirium are worthy of the highest praise. However, it is time to finish what you were brought here for. It is time to work for the good of the Kabal, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid wach, Chem-Pan-Sey." {n}Marazhais Stimme klingt widerwärtig süß. Er schaut dich wenig interessiert an und rollt einen weichen, trüben Gegenstand zwischen seinen Handflächen hin und her.{/n} "Unsere Toxinmeister haben keine Mühen gescheut, Euch aus dem herbeigeführten Traum zu holen. Ich muss den Albtraumwebern ein Lob aussprechen. Die Emanationen der Angst, die Ihr im Delirium ausgestrahlt habt, verdienen wirklich höchste Anerkennung. Es wird allerdings höchste Zeit, dass Ihr zu Ende bringt, wofür Ihr hergebracht worden seid. Es wird höchste Zeit, dass Ihr etwas zum Wohle der Kabale macht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."

languages.text: «Ah, por fin despiertas, mon-keigh». {n}La voz de Marazhai es repulsivamente zalamera. Te mira con escaso interés, pasándose un objeto blanco y lechoso de una mano a la otra.{/n} «Nuestros maestros de toxinas han probado de todo para sacarte del sueño inducido. Se impone una felicitación para los tejedores de pesadillas. Las emanaciones de miedo que exudabas en tu delirio son dignas de las más altas alabanzas. Sin embargo, ya es hora de que cumplas el cometido para el que te hemos traído. Es hora de que trabajes por el bien de la Kábala, Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "You are awake, mon-keigh." {n}Marazhai's voice is sickeningly sweet. He is looking at you with idle interest, rolling a soft and milky-coloured object from one hand to the other.{/n} "Our toxin masters spared no efforts to drag you out of the induced dream. I must commend the nightmare weavers. The emanations of fear you exuded in your delirium are worthy of the highest praise. However, it is time to finish what you were brought here for. It is time to work for the good of the Kabal, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Ah, por fin despiertas, mon-keigh». {n}La voz de Marazhai es repulsivamente zalamera. Te mira con escaso interés, pasándose un objeto blanco y lechoso de la palma de una mano a la otra.{/n} «Nuestros maestros de toxinas han probado de todo para sacarte del sueño inducido. Se impone una felicitación para los tejedores de pesadillas. Las emanaciones de miedo que exudabas en tu delirio son dignas de las más altas alabanzas. Sin embargo, ya es hora de que cumplas el cometido para el que te hemos traído. Es hora de que trabajes por el bien de la kábala, Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: "Uyanmışsın mon-keigh." {n}Marazhai'ın sesi, tiksinti verici derecede sevimli çıkıyor. Sana boş bir ilgiyle bakarken bir elinden diğerine süt rengi, yumuşak bir nesne yuvarlıyor.{/n} "Zehir üstatlarımız seni görmeye zorlandığın rüyadan çıkarmak için büyük çaba sarf etti. Kâbusbasanları takdir etmek lazım. Sayıklarken sarf ettiğin korku ibareleri büyük bir övgüyü hak ediyor. Gelgelelim şimdi burada olma sebebini yerine getirme zamanı. Kabal'ın iyiliği için çalışma zamanı Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: "You are awake, mon-keigh." {n}Marazhai's voice is sickeningly sweet. He is looking at you with idle interest, rolling a soft and milky-coloured object from one hand to the other.{/n} "Our toxin masters spared no efforts to drag you out of the induced dream. I must commend the nightmare weavers. The emanations of fear you exuded in your delirium are worthy of the highest praise. However, it is time to finish what you were brought here for. It is time to work for the good of the Kabal, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Uyanmışsın mon-keigh." {n}Marazhai'ın sesi tiksinti verici derecede sevimli. Sana boş bir ilgiyle bakarken, bir elinden diğerine süt rengi, yumuşak bir nesne yuvarlıyor.{/n} "Zehir üstatlarımız seni, sana zorla gördürülen rüyadan çıkarmak için büyük çaba sarf etti. Kâbus dokuyucularını takdir etmek lazım. Sayıklarken sarf ettiğin korku sızıntıları büyük övgüyü hak ediyor ancak şimdi burada olma sebebini yerine getirme zamanı. Kabal'ın iyiliği için çalışma zamanı Hür Tacir."
